scheme_name: Rent Subsidy for Sales Emporia Established by Handicrafts / Micro & Small Industries Emporium
description: This scheme in Puducherry provides rent subsidies to handicraft and micro/small industries emporia to promote their products. It aims to reduce the financial burden of renting sales spaces, thereby encouraging market presence for artisans and small businesses.
key_features: Support for handicraft and MSME product promotion

benefits.rent_subsidy: 50% of rent expenses, up to a maximum of Rs. 50,000 per year
benefits.duration: Subsidy available for up to 3 years

business_criteria: Must be a registered handicraft unit or MSME in Puducherry
Must operate a sales emporium for handicrafts or MSME products
operational_criteria: Emporium must be located in a rented commercial space
Must have a valid lease agreement

eligible_activities: Renting commercial spaces for sales emporia
Promoting handicraft and MSME products through retail outlets

steps: Obtain the application form from the Department of Industries and Commerce, Puducherry
Submit the application with details of the emporium and lease agreement
Attach required documents, including MSME registration and rent receipts
Applications are reviewed by the Industries Department
Approved applicants receive the subsidy periodically
application_process.note: Applicants must submit rent receipts annually to continue receiving the subsidy

special_notes: The subsidy is limited to 3 years per emporium
Emporia must exclusively promote handicraft or MSME products
Applicants must comply with Puducherryâ€™s industrial regulations
